remarks: A variation of the orthomodular law, showing ` CH ` is an orthomodular lattice.  (This corresponds to axiom "ax-r3" in the Quantum Logic Explorer.)  (Contributed by NM, 7-Aug-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
qlaxr3.1 $e |- A e. CH $.
qlaxr3.2 $e |- B e. CH $.
qlaxr3.3 $e |- C e. CH $.
qlaxr3.4 $e |- ( C vH ( _|_ ` C ) ) = ( ( _|_ ` ( ( _|_ ` A ) vH ( _|_ ` B ) ) ) vH ( _|_ ` ( A vH B ) ) ) $.
qlaxr3i $p |- A = B $.
